statements: SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT id, location, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location, pH, salinity, turbidity FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT AVG(pH) AS avg_pH, AVG(salinity) AS avg_salinity FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM water_quality_measurements GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_measurements DESC;
SELECT id, location, pH, salinity, turbidity, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE location = 'River' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(pH) AS avg_pH, SUM(salinity) AS total_salinity FROM water_quality_measurements GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE turbidity > 10 AND salinity < 15 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, location, measurement_date, pH FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH BETWEEN 6.0 AND 8.0 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, pH, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements INNER JOIN marine_locations ON water_quality_measurements.location_id = marine_locations.location_id;
SELECT AVG(pH), MAX(temperature), MIN(salinity) FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT * FROM marine_locations WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT location_name, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements JOIN marine_locations USING (location_id) WHERE salinity < 25 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7.0;
SELECT location_id, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE salinity < 35.0 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, pH, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements JOIN marine_locations ON water_quality_measurements.location_id = marine_locations.location_id;
SELECT AVG(pH) AS avg_pH, AVG(salinity) AS avg_salinity FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM marine_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 0;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT measurement_id, location, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE ph_level > 7.0;
SELECT location, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE salinity < 30.0 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, ph_level, salinity FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_date = '2022-06-15' AND temperature BETWEEN 25.0 AND 30.0;

SELECT m.location, l.country, s.source_name FROM water_quality_measurements m INNER JOIN marine_locations l ON m.location = l.location_name INNER JOIN measurements_sources s ON l.location_id = s.location_id WHERE s.contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, location ASC
SELECT measurement_id, location, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE ph_level < 7 AND salinity > 30

SELECT wqm.measurement_id, ml.location_name, wqm.measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements wqm JOIN marine_locations ml ON wqm.location = ml.location_name WHERE wqm.temperature < 20 AND ml.country = 'USA'

SELECT ms.source_name, ms.contact_person, ml.region FROM measurements_sources ms JOIN marine_locations ml ON ms.location_id = ml.location_id WHERE ms.contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY ms.source_name ASC
SELECT AVG(ph_level) AS avg_ph, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE ph_level > 6 AND salinity < 35
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Location WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT measurement_id, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityMeasurement WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT organism_name FROM MarineOrganisms WHERE organism_id = 2;
SELECT observation_id, quantity FROM OrganismObservation ORDER BY observation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT location_name FROM Location WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurement WHERE temperature > 25 AND salinity < 35;

SELECT mo.organism_name, oo.quantity, wqm.pH FROM MarineOrganisms mo JOIN OrganismObservation oo ON mo.organism_id = oo.organism_id JOIN WaterQualityMeasurement wqm ON oo.measurement_id = wqm.measurement_id;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT location_id, date, salinity FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE salinity > 25 AND pH < 7
SELECT location_id, date, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location_id, date, salinity, pH, temperature FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT m.location_id, p.parameter_name, m.value, m.measurement_date FROM measurements m JOIN parameters p ON m.parameter_id = p.parameter_id WHERE m.value > 7
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE salinity > 30 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_id, date, pH FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT source_name, parameter_name, unit FROM measurements_sources JOIN parameters ON measurements_sources.source_id = parameters.parameter_id;
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM measurements);
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND pH > 7 ORDER BY location_id DESC, date ASC;
